system.effect: The attack burns the target's foot, charring the flesh and emitting a foul aroma. The target suffers 2 levels of Fatigue. He must also make a Challenging (+0) Toughness test. If he succeeds, reduce his Movement by half (rounding up) until he receives medical attention; if he fails, he suffers the Lost Foot condition (see page 243).
